content.text: The real luxury is not working faster.
It’s knowing work is already handled.
He wakes up abruptly and grabs his phone.
His expression shifts from panic to calm.
Because the work is already done.
VA is never shown, only results

content.text: The boy pulls the chair out for the girl. They sit.
The girl is talking. Fully present.
His phone lies face-down on the table. Silent.
She realizes he’s here, but not really here.
City lights turn into soft bokeh.

fields.summary: Get Your Evenings Back (Bookkeepers Pain Point Ad)

content.text: Format: No Voiceover, Pure Visual Storytelling
Theme: Bookkeeping interrupts relaxation — VE gives it back.

A man sits down to watch Netflix after a long day. As the Stranger Things–style intro begins, he receives a bookkeeping deadline reminder. His excitement collapses. He switches off the TV, opens his laptop, searches Google for bookkeeping help, clicks Virtual Employee, and within seconds his books are clean. He then happily returns to watching Netflix, relaxed and relieved.
He sits on couch, popcorn ready.
Stranger Things intro begins (or a similar cinematic intro).
He reluctantly shuts off the TV.
This is relatable, emotional, and funny.
This is clean, simple, and high-trust.
He turns the TV back on.
Get your evenings back full video.mp4

fields.summary: When AI Designs… Nobody Cares (Graphic Designer Pain Point Ad)

content.text: 30-Second Café Owner Graphic Designer Ad (No VO, Cinematic, VE Quality)
Title: “When AI Designs… Nobody Cares. or AI Tried. Customers Didn’t.”
Concept: Café Owner – Graphic Designer Ad (30 sec, No Voiceover)

This ad shows a café owner trying to create his own social media posts using AI tools like Canva AI, Adobe Firefly, or Adobe Express. The AI-generated designs look poor, off-brand, and unprofessional. He posts them on Instagram, but gets almost no engagement — zero likes, no comments, barely any views.
He then scrolls Instagram and sees competitor cafés getting high engagement with beautifully designed posts. Feeling frustrated, he finally searches on Google:
“I need a graphic designer for my café”
. VE appears at the top of the results and he clicks it.

Next, we show the transformation — VE’s professional graphic designers create clean, aesthetic, on-brand posts for his café. He uploads these new designs, and suddenly his engagement skyrockets: likes increasing rapidly, positive comments, shares, and overall buzz.
The ad ends with the café owner looking relieved and happy inside his café.
Wide shot of a cozy, modern café:
Café owner sits at the counter with a laptop.
Canva AI / Adobe Firefly / Adobe Express
This scene sets the world perfectly.
Quick montage of bad AI-generated Instagram posts for the café:
This is PURE emotional storytelling — no words needed.
He posts the design on Instagram.
He looks at his own post again.
“I need a graphic designer for my café”
He posts the new VE design.
He stands behind the counter, relaxed and fulfilled.
Couple of feedbacks Implemented and shared another version for review:
Final Video shared after all the changes done:
